thread.title: Customer
thread.title_full: White Mountain Puzzles reviewed by Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: I often buy these for family vacations but my most recent order involved ordering a number of them for a contest during our town's Winterfest. The design was great due to the road construction this town has experienced the past year and the theme gave us something to smile about. I look forward to buying new ones this coming summer.
